# ondevicemotion

**Instance Property**

The event listener that is called when the device motion changes. 

## Declaration

```swift
attribute EventHandler ondevicemotion;
```

## Discussion

Read [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/devicemotionevent] for details.

## Getting Orientation and Motion Events

- **orientation**: Specifies the orientation of the device.
- **ondeviceorientation**: The event listener that is called while the device orientation changes around the x, y, and z axes.
